column99:
About Social Foodies 
 Social Foodies is a purpose-driven company dedicated to creating high-quality, deluxe chocolate, ice cream, coffee and other specialty products, while making a positive impact in communities worldwide. We operate as a social enterprise, ensuring that our products are sustainably sourced and contribute to meaningful change, particularly in developing countries. 
 We are looking for a passionate and experienced  Store Manager & New Product Developer  who will take on a dual role—overseeing store operations while driving innovation in our new product development. This role requires strong leadership, hands-on manufacturing expertise, and a deep understanding of ESG principles and social impact reporting. 
 Key Responsibilities 
 Store Management 
 
 
 Lead daily operations of our Vedbæk store, ensuring a seamless customer experience. 
 
 
 Manage, train, and motivate store staff to maintain high-performance standards. 
 
 
 Oversee inventory, sales performance, and customer engagement strategies. 
 
 
 Work certain weekends to support store activities and promotions. 
 
 
 New Product Development & Production 
 
 
 Drive the development of new high-quality, deluxe chocolate products and other delicacies within different categories. 
 
 
 Manage chocolate production processes, ensuring consistency and excellence. 
 
 
 Oversee sourcing of premium raw materials and maintain quality control. 
 
 
 Implement innovative production techniques while adhering to sustainability standards. 
 
 
 ESG & Social Enterprise Engagement 
 
 
 Develop and maintain partnerships with suppliers and social enterprises in developing countries, with a strong focus on Africa. 
 
 
 Negotiate and secure deals with new vendors, ensuring ethical sourcing practices. 
 
 
 Report on social impact metrics, demonstrating our commitment to responsible business practices. 
 
 
 Ensure that ESG principles are integrated into all aspects of product development and store operations. 
 
 
 What We’re Looking For 
 
 
 Background in Business & Management : Proven experience in leadership roles with a strong ability to manage people and operations. 
 
 
 Chocolate Manufacturing Expertise : Hands-on experience in producing high-quality, deluxe chocolate. 
 
 
 ESG & Social Enterprise Experience : Prior involvement in sustainable business practices, preferably in Africa or other developing regions. 
 
 
 Vendor Negotiation Skills : Strong track record in building and negotiating deals with suppliers. 
 
 
 Social Impact Reporting : Experience in tracking and reporting on social and environmental impact metrics. 
 
 
 Entrepreneurial & Hands-On Attitude : A self-starter who thrives in a dynamic environment and is passionate about making a difference. 
 
 
 What We Offer 
 
 
 The opportunity to work in a purpose-driven company dedicated to social impact. 
 
 
 A dynamic, hands-on role with leadership responsibilities. 
 
 
 A chance to develop innovative, high-quality chocolate products. 
 
 
 Collaboration with an engaged team and international partners. 
 
 
 Competitive salary based on experience. 
 
 
 If you are passionate about chocolate, sustainability, and driving positive change, we would love to hear from you!
